page.title: 21Goode Family Garway
page.content:
During my family reaserch i found my g,g,g,grandfather was William Goode born circa 1756 died1831 buried in St Michaels church Garway the Goode family lived at "The Turning" Garway he was a blacksmith as were all the males in the family and all living in the same house "The Turning" untill the last direct descendant Elizabeth Goode died in 1936

William had 3 children Mary b1796-d1885 Ann G b1798 Thomas b1801 d1884. Thomas m- Sarah Payne, they had 4 children Mary Ann b1839 d1875 William Lewis,b1841 d1842 Elizabeth b-1844 d1936 John b-1846 d1931
John Calvin Lewis
